title: クリエイターをピュアに評価するシステム
description:
クリエイターがブローカーやプロデューサーにより、中央主権的に管理された現状が問題である。

また、平等な表現の機会や評価が得られず、本当に評価されるべき人や行動・事に焦点が当てられず、クリエイターに対する評価基準や評価制度が設けられていない。有名無名にかかわらず、盗作品が出回ってしまい本当は誰の作品なのか分からない。
author: d.nart.ampta
problem_solution: やり甲斐搾取や中央集権的、不透明な評価システムをスマートコントラクトの導入により、評価の見える化をします。明確な評価基準・貢献度の評価を設定することで、１人が皆を管理するのではなく、クリエイター１人をコミュニティで評価するシステムにします。そこから、貢献度に応じて正当な分配が行くように仕組み作りをします。
relevant_experience:
私達は、D.Nart.Ampta略してDNAといいD・N・Aにはそれぞれ意味があります。

【D】ダイバーシティ/一人ひとりの違いを尊重し、公正公平（立場、環境、言語に囚われる事なくフラットな関わる）

【N】ナート(縫い合わせる)/クリエーターと社会、人と服との関係を再考し縫い合わせる。

【A】アンプタ(切断する)/創造に対する壁を無くし、服を概念を再定義する。

現在は30人程の様々なジャンルのクリエイターが所属しています。

how_does_success_look_like_: Countries from different continents converging on common ground based on common problems. Solutions unite us in the distance.
importance: Global dialogue has the opportunity to find its own way. Similar problems present similar opportunities for solutions.

title: Climate Change: THE Challenge
description: Climate Change is humanity's greatest challenge going forward. How will Cardano contribute to solving this wicked problem?
author: cardano4climate
how_does_success_look_like_: Climate Change impact has been significantly reduced by successfully nurturing and completing Catalyst Projects now and in the long term
importance: Legacy systems have failed us on climate change! This is Cardanos opportunity to demonstrate that it can build regenerative, better systems

title: Learn English with Cardano
description: Why don't we combine learning English with bringing cardano to more people?
author: phamtunglamjapanchannel
how_does_success_look_like_: TBA
importance: TBA

how_does_success_look_like_: Coming soon
importance: Coming soon

title: Accelerate Women on Cardano ECO
description:
How do we grow the number of Women on Cardano globally?

  


In the next 24 months, how will we inspire and support women to join the Cardano ecosystem?
author: nguyenthiha07tp1
how_does_success_look_like_: Connect and broaden the women's knowledge as well as their roles. Significantly raise their active involvement in the Cardano ecosystem
importance: Women have enormous potential and can make significant contributions to the Cardano ecosystem; they should be encouraged to participate more

title: Open Source Nature 🍄
description: How can Liquid Democracy Legalize Psychedelics, so everyone has access to the True Open Source?
author: jo8n
how_does_success_look_like_: Cardano's Project Catalyst builds community culture around an actually Challenging Question.
importance: In 1884, Charles Dodgson (Alice in Wonderland) first envisioned transitive/"liquid" voting in The Principles of Parliamentary Representation

title: Grow LatinAmerica, Grow Cardano
description: How do we increase Cardano adoption on our countries?
author: agustin
how_does_success_look_like_: Making innovative projects that can bring real solutions to the people.
importance: Because we have 600 million people living in Latin America. And a lot of the problems we have here can be solved by Cardano.

title: Gamers On-Chained
description: What blockchain gaming applications and infrastructure can be built to achieve mass adoption of Cardano?
author: playermint
how_does_success_look_like_: Cardano becomes the go to blockchain for gamers, with a steady base of developers building rewarding experiences.
importance: Gamers are crypto curious and large in population (2.5b). They need a quality blockchain with enjoyable applications to engage on.

title: Cardano and Agriculture
description: What are the potential issues in the Agri-food industry that could be addressed using the Cardano blockchain technology?
author: zakariam.munir
how_does_success_look_like_:
Creating a more Healthy and transparent Agricultural chain which will go down in favor

1. the production chain
2. the supply chain
3. consumer chain
importance: 21st century Agriculture is facing a lot of issues that could be solved by blockchain technology through Cardano.

title: Cardano Open Source Hall of Fame
description: How do we reward great Cardano open source contributors, acknowledge their impact and encourage others to do the same.
author: lley154
how_does_success_look_like_: High voter participation that inspires others which leads to an increase in the number of open source projects on Cardano.
importance: High quality open source projects is the best way to scale developer knowledge by showcasing real world code examples, videos and tutorials.

title: Governance
description: How can we run parallel experiments with governance and build up best practices and capacity as we head into Voltaire? What organizational systems, methods, conversations are critical to govern?
author: xeeban
how_does_success_look_like_: Many parallel experiments in governance by multiple community groups share best practices, as well as learn from failed experiments.
importance: Without community-driven governance experiments, we risk not having good models and input into how governance will look for Catalyst.

title: Global Health Care on Cardano
description: How could the global healthcare community leverage Cardano tech to provide better pharma R&D & global access to life-saving medications?
author: captivatingnaturals
how_does_success_look_like_: Proposals for projects that use Cardano to decentralize: development, production, access to drugs & tech to combat critical global illnesses
importance: Currently Big Pharma controls manufacturing, pricing, and global access to life-saving medications and devices. Decentralization is needed.

title: NPOs/NGOs Integration & Solution
description:
How can NPOs/NGOs optimize Cardano for project management, reporting, M&E and income generation for project implementation to transform more lives?

  


NPOs /NGOs are the drivers of development in Africa
author: emeliasarfo2
how_does_success_look_like_:
* More people engaged in Cardano
* Cardano becomes the best crypto
* More physical project changing lives
* More communities
* More developers
* Wallets
importance: NPOs in developing countries can scale up Cardano and project catalyst through the numerous projects that are funded by major organizations.

title: Funding Categories Full Fund
description: How can we improve funding categorisation in Catalyst by using more effective approaches like funding categories?
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: Increasing the effectiveness of funding categorisation so that the most promising proposals can be submitted that provide the highest impact
importance: Challenge settings are not effective for funding categorisation. Funding categories offers a simpler, more effective & scalable solution.

title: Cardano Contributors
description: What full time contributors can be funded to help support and improve the Cardano ecosystem?
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: Cardano community members solving important problems are funded so they can continue providing high impact
importance: Cardano needs full time contributors to help improve the development ecosystem in Cardano and stake pool ecosystem

title: Catalyst Contributors
description: What full time contributors can be funded to help support, build and grow the Catalyst ecosystem?
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: Catalyst community members solving important problems are funded so they can continue providing high impact
importance: Catalyst needs more community members working full time in the ecosystem so it can reach its potential

title: Film & media
description: Global entertainment+media market = $2 trillion. A decentralized FAM network to produce quality Cardano community media is vital yet absent.
author: petr.smelik
how_does_success_look_like_: Teams collaborating equitably to produce inclusive, high quality multimedia content + platforms = increase knowledge + adoption of Cardano.
importance: A challenge category for creatives has been absent so far. Diversity + human creativity in the arts can enrich the Cardano ecosystem.

title: Nurturing Ideas & Teams
description: How can we support new ideas and teams that form and bring new innovations and support the ecosystem?
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: An increasing number of small initiatives and ideas that provide new opportunities to the ecosystem to learn and benefit from
importance: There is a need for a diverse group of teams and ideas exploring different ways to innovate and support the ecosystem

title: Scale-UP Cardano Community Hubs
description: How do we encourage Local Hubs to drive adoption and awareness of Cardano? How do we ensure they are optimizing and scaling efficiently?
author: joshf
how_does_success_look_like_: Local Community Hubs across the world where the average person can take part in their own language and with their own cultural understanding
importance: With dozens of community hubs now funded, we need a more sophisticated approach to scaling that includes documentation, tooling and support.

title: Development & Infrastructure
description: What research, tools or software can improve the developer ecosystem or infrastructure to make it easier to build and scale on the Cardano blockchain?
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: Innovation in tools, software or research that support how developers build applications or that help with improving Cardano infrastructure
importance: Developers need tools and software to more easily build and scale applications and integrations on the Cardano blockchain

title: Governance & Identity
description: What tools, processes and research will improve how we integrate governance or identity solutions both in Catalyst and the wider Cardano ecosystem?
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: Evolution of the governance and identity tools, processes and resources to improve Catalyst and applications building on Cardano
importance: Cardano needs effective governance & identity tools, processes and experiments to make it easier to develop and scale community solutions

title: Products & Integrations
description: What products and integrations can be developed or improved that will offer more use cases to the Cardano ecosystem that are high impact and drive more adoption?
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: An increasing number of products and integrations that offer new solutions for people to interact with and benefit from using Cardano.
importance: Cardano needs innovations and solutions that help the ecosystem reach its potential and help improve the systems we use across the world.

title: Community & Outreach
description: How can we engage the community, do outreach that brings more people into the ecosystem and support collaborations with external people and organisations.
author: pace
how_does_success_look_like_: Communities forming around topics, public goods or focus areas that promote collaboration and introduce people to the community.
importance: Cardano needs an engaged thriving community along with collaborate efforts that effectively welcome those outside the community

how_does_success_look_like_: CLA
importance: CLA

title: Cardano for Seniors Outreach
description: How does Cardano provide a Safe environment for 2 billion Seniors Globally to engage with DeFi and Cardano. What services can be provided or developed that can fill the needs of this Niche Market?
author: headelf
how_does_success_look_like_: Success looks like DApps and services developed on Cardano to accommodate the special needs while focused on Risk Management for Seniors.
importance: There are ~2 billion Senior Citizens globally that are 55 and older. This demographic will double in 10 years. Why not lead this market?

title: SPO Tools & Community Projects
description: How can we support effective and impactful projects and initiatives to build and support the SPO Ecosystem and Community?
author: rhysstoic
how_does_success_look_like_: Kicking off Community based solutions to build SPO Tools & Platforms, to offer Services, Events, and Research
importance: SPOs play a crucial role in the Cardano Ecosystem. A Catalyst Challenge would incentivize the building of SPO based Projects on Cardano

title: Grow Africa, Grow Cardano
description: How do we continue to seed and grow Cardano adoption in 2022 and beyond?
author: wada
how_does_success_look_like_: Innovative community building through infrastructure provision and Web3 education with a clear roadmap to increased adoption at scale.
importance: We need to look at the fundamentals that are preventing Africa from being a Cardano adoption leader, rather than a perpetual follower.
